name: VOLANSI
description: Designer/operator of autonomous, unmanned vehicles for commercial/military applications.
sampleDescriptions: Support the use of autonomous, unmanned vehicles for intelligence, surveillance and reconnaissance and tactical resupply in the FY2021 National Defense Authorization and Appropriations cycles.
